mapper.insert: insert into ums_menu (id, parent_id, create_time, title, `level`, sort, `name`, icon, hidden) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hidden,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update ums_menu set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `level` = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hidden = #{hidden,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, parent_id, create_time, title, `level`, sort, `name`, icon, hidden from ums_menu
